pageProps.title: cookiecutter-spacy-fastapi
pageProps.teaser: Docker-based cookiecutter for easy spaCy APIs using FastAPI

data.title: cookiecutter-spacy-fastapi
data.slogan: Docker-based cookiecutter for easy spaCy APIs using FastAPI
data.description: Docker-based cookiecutter for easy spaCy APIs using FastAPI. The default endpoints expect batch requests with a list of Records in the Azure Search Cognitive Skill format. So out of the box, this cookiecutter can be setup as a Custom Cognitive Skill. For more on Azure Search and Cognitive Skills [see this page](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/search/cognitive-search-custom-skill-interface).
data.author: Microsoft
